scripts.prevesion: npm run build && npm run lint
scripts.version:alpha: npm run prevesion && lerna version prerelease --preid alpha --force-publish=* --no-git-tag-version -m "chore(versions): publish packages %s"
scripts.version:beta: npm run prevesion && lerna version prerelease --preid beta --force-publish=* --no-git-tag-version -m "chore(versions): publish packages %s"
scripts.version:rc: npm run prevesion && lerna version prerelease --preid rc --force-publish=* --no-git-tag-version -m "chore(versions): publish packages %s"
scripts.version:patch: npm run prevesion && lerna version patch --force-publish=* --no-git-tag-version -m "chore(versions): publish packages %s"
scripts.version:minor: npm run prevesion && lerna version minor --force-publish=* --no-git-tag-version -m "chore(versions): publish packages %s"
scripts.version:preminor: npm run prevesion && lerna version preminor --preid beta --force-publish=* --no-git-tag-version -m "chore(versions): publish packages %s"
scripts.version:major: npm run prevesion && lerna version major --force-publish=* --no-git-tag-version -m "chore(versions): publish packages %s"
